message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this product which I believe would be incredibly valuable to you. I'm asking for $11,000.  I think it's a fair price considering the benefits it will bring.
I appreciate your offer, Alice. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. I believe that's a more reasonable price considering the market value of the product.
Bob, I understand your perspective on the market value.  However, this product offers unique advantages that justify a higher price.  How about we meet in the middle at $10,000?
I understand the unique advantages of the product, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to go up to $9,500, but that's as high as I can go.
